sentences.en: Adventure: The bariaur's wanderlust makes them an ideal adventurer.
sentences.cn: 冒险: 半人羊的漫游癖使得他们成为理想的冒险者.

sentences.en: His wanderlust would not allow him to stay long in one spot.
sentences.cn: 他酷爱旅游，无法在一个地方久留。

sentences.en: If your birthday falls on April 25, you will be positively overcome with wanderlust - let it happen!
sentences.cn: 如果你是4月25号出生的, 不要克制你与生俱来的流浪愿望了 — 开始吧.

sentences.en: This wanderlust is growing among students, too.
sentences.cn: 这种“出国欲”也正在学生当中滋长.

words.tran_cn: 流浪的；漫游的，徘徊的；蜿蜒的
流浪者；漫游者；迷路的动物

trans.tran_en: a strong desire to travel to different places
